response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price not only reflects its true worth but also provides an opportunity for both of us to benefit. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 12000}
